trans-unit.source: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 显示的标记的项，通过每个表示的分层集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that are assigned to the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>集合保存所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>分配给树视图控件的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的树节点称为根树节点。

trans-unit.source: Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node.
trans-unit.target: 任何后来添加到根树节点的树节点被称为子节点。

trans-unit.source: Because each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can contain a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因为每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>可以包含其他集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象，你可能发现很难确定你的树状结构中的位置，当循环访问集合时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can parse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> string by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: 你可以分析<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>字符串值以确定位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>标签的起始和结束。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property and referencing the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to assign that <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>属性和引用的程序<xref:System.Drawing.Image>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配该<xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList></xref:System.Drawing.Image>的索引值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>显示的树节点旁的图像

trans-unit.source: Use the following properties to assign images: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下属性分配图像:-设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性的索引值<xref:System.Drawing.Image>你想要在不在选定树节点时显示。</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: -将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性的索引值<xref:System.Drawing.Image>你想要在选定树节点时显示。</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The images referenced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 引用的图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性值是分配给所有树节点都显示的默认图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 每个树节点可以通过设置重写默认映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the TreeView are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: 在树视图中显示的状态图像是默认情况下的 16 x 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>将它们对如何显示映像没有影响。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，状态图像将调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```可以展开树节点以显示子树节点的下一个级别。

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, or you can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以展开<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>通过单击加号 （+） 按钮，如果旁边显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，或可以展开<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To expand all the child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要展开中的所有子树节点级别<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>集合，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 可以折叠子<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>级别通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或用户可以按减号 （-） 按钮，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>旁边显示的一个</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>展开和折叠状态之间切换的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 树节点可以选择性地显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the TreeView to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示对应的复选框，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性到 TreeView `true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>属性设置为`true`处于选中状态的树节点。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>事件导致被多次引发该事件，并且可能导致意外行为。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>事件处理程序中时以递归方式更新的子节点，以便用户不必展开，然后检查每个单独的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止被多次引发事件，请将逻辑添加到事件处理程序仅执行递归代码，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> events.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何执行此操作的示例，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>

trans-unit.source: You can change the appearance of the TreeView control by setting some of its display and style properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置其显示和样式属性的某些更改 TreeView 控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>到`true`显示每个旁边的加号或减号按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，可以展开或折叠，分别。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property to `true` causes the TreeView to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>属性`true`会导致树视图显示联接在一起的所有根树节点的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 可以显示线条来连接到其根节点的子树节点，通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>属性`true`的树节点标签的外观当鼠标指针移过的更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>

trans-unit.source: When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 在热跟踪，树节点标签采用超链接的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can also completely customize the appearance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以完全自 TreeView 控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>属性的值以外的其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>并处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties at run time, the TreeView handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性在运行时，重新创建 TreeView 句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 以更新控件的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致除外的所选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>折叠所有树节点

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: 在选中树节点复选框后发生。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or AfterCheck event handler causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>或 AfterCheck 事件处理程序导致被多次引发该事件，并可能会导致意外行为。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止被多次引发事件，请将逻辑添加到事件处理程序仅执行递归代码，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: 在选中树节点复选框前发生。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the BeforeCheck or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>从 BeforeCheck 中的属性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>事件导致被多次引发该事件，并且可能导致意外行为。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes, so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>事件处理程序中时你是以递归方式更新子节点中，以便用户不必展开，然后检查每个单独的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止被多次引发事件，请将逻辑添加到事件处理程序仅执行递归代码，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Disables any redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 禁用任何树视图重绘。

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the BeginUpdate method.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护性能，而项被添加到一次一个地<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，调用 BeginUpdate 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdate method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdate 方法阻止从之前的绘制控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 将项添加到树视图控件的首选的方式是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>方法将树节点项的数组添加到树视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要一次添加一个项目，使用 BeginUpdate 方法以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>添加操作期间进行绘制的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To allow the control to resume painting, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许继续绘制的控件，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>方法时所有树节点已都添加到树视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树视图控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: When the BorderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance.
trans-unit.target: 当 BorderStyle 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>具有凹陷的三维外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: To display a flat, thin border around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要平面、 精简的周围显示边框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在树视图控件中的树节点旁显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, if any.
trans-unit.target: 左侧的树节点标签和树节点显示一个复选框<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，如果任何。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time.
trans-unit.target: 复选框允许用户一次选择多个树节点。

trans-unit.source: When the CheckBoxes property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 时的复选框属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>设置为`true`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>设置属性时，每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>显示的第一个和第二个图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>选中或选中状态，以分别指示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the CheckBoxes property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set.
trans-unit.target: 但是，显示的图像可能会出现以下情况时不同︰ 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>节点的设置为 0 或 1 和父级的复选框属性以外的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>将不会自动重置为-1 以指示未设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，显示指示的索引位置处的状态图像。

trans-unit.source: If CheckBoxes is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果复选框设置为`true`同样，第一个和第二个图像的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>显示以分别指示选中或取消选中状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the CheckBoxes property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时在运行时，设置复选框属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 以更新控件的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致除外的所选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>折叠所有树节点

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box is displayed next to each tree node in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在树视图控件; 每个树节点旁显示一个复选框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Collapses all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 折叠所有树节点。

trans-unit.source: The CollapseAll method collapses all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 全部折叠方法折叠所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象，其中包括所有子树节点，包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>仍然存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method for a root tree node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>根树节点的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前没有折叠子树节点，它们将显示在其先前的展开状态。

trans-unit.source: Calling the CollapseAll method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 调用全部折叠方法可确保所有树节点都显示在折叠状态。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> elements are drawn automatically.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The appearance of the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>元素都自动绘制。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|完整的外观<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>可以自定义。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| The region that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: 图标、 复选框，加号和减号情况下，和连接节点的线必须根据需要手动绘制。 | 区域的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值将占用如果已使用指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>属性是在其中可以单击节点以选择它。 的区域</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>的字体绘制</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: 这称为命中的测试区域。

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果你绘制此区域外，你应提供你自己选择节点，单击其可见区域时的代码。

trans-unit.source: The hit test region corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: 命中的测试区域对应于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>时</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property encompasses the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>，但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>的整个宽度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value and accessing its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以通过获取访问命中的测试区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值并访问其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您可以绘制这些边界内的节点的命中的测试区域，也可以提供你自己的命中的测试代码。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将设置的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性不会更改其计算使用整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>指定的字体的命中的测试区域的大小</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Enables the redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 启用树视图重绘。

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护性能，而项被添加到一次一个地<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method prevents the control from painting until the EndUpdate method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法会阻止控件绘制 EndUpdate 方法调用之前。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 将项添加到树视图控件的首选的方式是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>方法将树节点项的数组添加到树视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要一次添加一个项目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以阻止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>添加操作期间进行绘制的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To allow control the control to resume painting, call the EndUpdate method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许控件要恢复绘制的控件，请调用 EndUpdate 方法，已将所有树节点都添加到树视图时。

trans-unit.source: Expands all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 展开所有树节点。

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 全部展开方法会扩展到所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象，其中包括所有子树节点，包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>仍然存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method, and then the individual root tree nodes are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法，然后单个根树节点会折叠。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child tree nodes have not been collapsed, and will appear in their previously-expanded state when the root tree nodes are expanded again.
trans-unit.target: 子树节点不已折叠，并再次展开的根树节点时将显示在其先前的展开状态。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>方法可确保所有树节点都显示在折叠状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected tree node remains highlighted even when the tree view has lost the focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值在树视图已失去焦点的情况下，即使选定的树节点是否保持突出显示。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`，所选节点在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件仍会不同于当前所选内容的颜色突出显示颜色时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件失去焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于保留时在用户单击窗体上一个不同的控件，或将移动到不同的窗口由可见用户选定的项。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你担心你的应用程序的可访问性，建议你将 HideSelection 属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected tree node is not highlighted when the tree view has lost the focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 值是索引<xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>和 ImageIndex 属性是互相排斥; 如果已设置，另一个被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>，ImageIndex 自动设置为-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你设置 ImageIndex，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>自动设置为一个空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the ImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时在运行时，设置 ImageIndex 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 以更新控件的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致除外的所选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>折叠所有树节点

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的索引，它表示的位置<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image for each node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when it is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在每个节点的默认图像的键<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制当处于未选中状态。

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 属性是不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have an image set, the image specified by the ImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>没有设置，将显示属性，该节点没有选定 ImageKey 所指定的映像的映像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When the node is selected, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 选中节点时中的第一个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>将显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性是互斥的这意味着如果已设置，另一个被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置 ImageKey 属性中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性自动设置为-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property, the ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性，ImageKey 自动设置为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown for each node <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 为每个节点显示的默认图像的键<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制当节点处于未选中状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>树节点所使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property value is anything other than `null`, all the tree nodes display the first <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>属性的值不是`null`，所有树节点都显示第一个<xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which images from the list are displayed for selected and unselected nodes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定选定和未选定的节点显示从列表中的映像，应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects can specify which image is displayed by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象可以指定哪个映像将显示通过设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: These individual settings will override the settings in the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> properties.
trans-unit.target: 各项设置将替代的相应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the .NET Framework version 1.1, there is an issue that prevents images from appearing on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> nodes when your application calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在.NET Framework 1.1 版中，没有可防止映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>节点时应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>上出现的问题

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your `Main` method immediately after you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中你`Main`方法之后立即调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This issue is fixed in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此问题固定的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>树节点所使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树节点级别的每个子元素的缩进距离。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of -1 does not throw an exception if the value has not yet been changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为-1 的值不引发异常，如果值已不已更改不再是默认值。

trans-unit.source: This is because the control uses a value of -1 as an internal default before the control handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为该控件为内部的默认值在创建控件句柄之前，都使用值-1。

trans-unit.source: This internal default value causes the wrapped control to return its own default value of 19.
trans-unit.target: 此内部默认值会导致要返回其自己的默认值为 19 的已包装的控件。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，每个子树节点级别的缩进距离。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 19.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 19。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0 (see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值小于的 0 （请参阅备注）。

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than 32,000.
trans-unit.target: -或者-所赋的值大于 32000。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入的键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: If the user is editing a tree node, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control treats keys such as ENTER, ESC, HOME, and END as input keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户正在编辑树节点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件将视为输入键如 ENTER、 ESC、 主页和最终的密钥。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: 密钥值之一。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的键是常规输入的键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树视图控件中的每个树节点的高度。

trans-unit.source: If the item height is set to a value larger than the height of the tree view control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method will have unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 如果将项的高度设置为值大于树视图控件的高度，则调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将具有意外的结果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of each tree node in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，在树视图中每个树节点的高度。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值是小于一。

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than the <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue> value.
trans-unit.target: -或-所赋的值大于<xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>值。</xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label text of the tree nodes can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以编辑树节点标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A> method works only if the LabelEdit property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>方法适用只有当 LabelEdit 属性时`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If LabelEdit is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state.
trans-unit.target: 如果 LabelEdit`false`当你尝试编辑标签，将引发异常且树节点将不被放入到可编辑状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the label text of the tree nodes can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以编辑树节点标签文本;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the lines connecting the nodes of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置连接的节点的线条的颜色<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the lines connecting the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>的连接的树节点的行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>使用鼠标。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击使用鼠标，包括加号树节点中的任何部分，将发生此事件 (**+**) 或负号 (**-**)，该值指示节点是否是折叠或展开。

trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.

trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，NodeMouseHover 事件会发生之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取分配给树视图控件的树节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property holds a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, each of which has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property that can contain its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 节点属性包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象，其中每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>可以包含其自己的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 此嵌套的树节点可能会使其难以导航树状结构，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>属性，则可以更方便地确定你树状结构中的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>表示分配给树视图控件的树节点。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the OnKeyDown method switches between selecting and clearing the check box when the user presses the SPACEBAR.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control will select the first item that begins with the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property of `e`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值在需要时，树视图控件是否显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is located outside the control's client region.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，滚动条上显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>位于控件的客户端区域外。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the Scrollable property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当在运行时，设置可滚动的属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 以更新控件的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果树视图控件时它们必需的; 显示滚动条否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当树节点选定时显示的图像的图像列表索引值。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageIndex 值是索引<xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the SelectedImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时在运行时，设置 SelectedImageIndex 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 以更新控件的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致除外的所选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>折叠所有树节点

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的位置的从零开始的索引值<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 分配的索引值小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置时显示的默认图像的键<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have a selected image set, the image specified by the SelectedImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>没有选择的映像设置，将显示属性，该节点没有选定 SelectedImageKey 所指定的映像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageKey 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>是互相排斥的属性; 如果已设置，另一个被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectedImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置 SelectedImageKey 属性中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性自动设置为-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property, the SelectedImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性，SelectedImageKey 自动设置为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 显示时的默认图像的键<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tree node that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树视图控件中当前选定的树节点。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is currently selected, the SelectedNode property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>是当前选定，SelectedNode 属性是`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the specified node is scrolled into view and any parent nodes are expanded so that the specified node is visible.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的节点被滚动到视图并展开节点，以便指定的节点是可见的任何父。

trans-unit.source: When the parent node or any ancestor node of the selected node is collapsed either programmatically or through user action, the collapsed node becomes the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 父节点或所选节点的所有祖先节点处于折叠状态或者以编程方式或通过用户执行任何操作，折叠的节点将成为所选的节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>树视图控件中当前选定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在树视图控件中的树节点之间绘制连线。

trans-unit.source: If ShowLines is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ShowLines 设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在树视图控件; 中的树节点之间绘制连线否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示鼠标指针悬停时显示工具提示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In order for ToolTips to be visible, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 为了使工具提示可见，你必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A>为一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果鼠标指针悬停时显示工具提示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否包含子树节点的树节点旁显示加号 （+） 和减号 （-） 按钮。

trans-unit.source: The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根树节点才旁边的加号和减号按钮出现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>属性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显示的加号和减号按钮，没有视觉提示存在是为了指示树节点，包含子树节点并且是可扩展的。

trans-unit.source: The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it.
trans-unit.target: 然后，用户必须双击树节点以确定其是否包含子树节点，以将其展开，或将其折叠起来。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if plus sign and minus sign buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果包含子树节点; 的树节点旁显示加号和减号按钮否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在树视图根处的树节点之间绘制连线。

trans-unit.source: If the ShowRootLines property is `false`, the plus-sign and minus-sign buttons will not appear next to the root tree nodes, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ShowRootLines 属性为`false`，加号和减号按钮旁边的根树节点中，将不会出现与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>属性将产生任何影响。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在树视图中; 根处的树节点之间绘制连线否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对中的项进行排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将重新应用默认排序，这是按字母顺序的节点文本或指定自定义排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改现有节点的文本或节点被移动用户，并且你想要再次的项进行排序，可以使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 默认排序使用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>应用程序所指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此行为可能不同，如果应用自定义排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否进行了排序的树视图中的树节点。

trans-unit.source: When Sorted is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects are sorted in alphabetical order by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 当 Sorted 设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象按字母顺序进行排序其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You should always use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> to maintain performance when you add a large quantity of items to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 你应始终使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>维护时添加了大量的项排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>到的性能</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the text of an existing node is changed, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> to resort the items.
trans-unit.target: 现有节点的文本更改时，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>需采用项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 默认排序使用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>应用程序所指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于指示的状态的图像列表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>及其节点。

trans-unit.source: To indicate the state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, set the StateImageList property and also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 来指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>、 设置 StateImageList 属性，并且还设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>的状态

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: 在显示的状态图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>是默认情况下的 16 x 16 像素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the StateImageList will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>StateImageList 属性将它们对如何显示映像没有影响。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true` and the StateImageList property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the StateImageList to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 但是，状态图像将调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>设置为`true`和设置属性时，每个 StateImageList<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>显示从 StateImageList 选中或选中状态，以分别指示的第一个和第二个映像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should set the StateImageList property before you add nodes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to prevent state images being shown at design time for nodes that do not have a state image set.
trans-unit.target: 在添加到节点之前，应设置 StateImageList 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>若要防止在没有状态图像的节点的设计时显示的状态图像将。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> used for indicating the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>用于指示的状态<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>及其节点。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树视图控件中的第一个完全可见的树节点。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the TopNode returns the first root tree node, which is located at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 最初，TopNode 返回位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>顶部的第一个根树节点

trans-unit.source: However, if the user has scrolled the contents, another tree node might be at the top.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果用户已经滚动内容，另一个树节点可能位于顶部。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置此属性未包含任何时生效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>属性值是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>表示树视图控件中的第一个完全可见的树节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>包含名称的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>，如果任何。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应被替代。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含名称的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>(如果有） 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>是未命名。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> to perform a custom sort of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>执行自定义的排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>节点。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The custom sort is applied when the TreeViewNodeSorter is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TreeViewNodeSorter 时，将应用自定义排序。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label is changed, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> method to sort the items again with the custom sorter specified by the TreeViewNodeSorter property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>标签发生了更改，你可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>方法对项进行排序再次使用 TreeViewNodeSorter 属性指定的自定义排序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 默认排序使用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>应用程序所指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此行为可能不同，如果应用自定义排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> to perform the custom sort.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>来执行自定义的排序。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of tree nodes that can be fully visible in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取树视图控件中完全可见的树节点数。

trans-unit.source: The VisibleCount value can be greater than the number of tree nodes in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: VisibleCount 值可以是大于在树视图中的树节点数。

trans-unit.source: The value is calculated by dividing the height of the client window by the height of a tree node item.
trans-unit.target: 除以的树节点项的高度由客户端窗口的高度计算的值。

trans-unit.source: The result is the total number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> can display within its current dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 结果是总数目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>可以显示在其当前的维度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that can be fully visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>中完全可见的项<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控件。
